1.content:
Long ass time ago...

"Hey, Adam?" Little Blake asked "Are you dating anyone?"

"No." Little Adam answered "I don't want to either."

"Why not?" Little Blake

"Because girls are icky." Little Adam said "You know that, you are a icky girl."

"I'm not icky!"

"You're the ickiest girl there is!"

Little Blake rolled her eyes. She knew how to deal with people like Little Adam.

With her voice a few octaves higher Little Blake said "You know that little kitty girls like me can't be icky Nya~"

"Little kitty girls like you can't be icky." Little Adam repeated.

"That's right meow! In fact, you want to be my boyfriend Nya."

"I want to be your boyfriend."

Little Blake smiled. No one could refuse her when she used her kitty voice.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Now

After seeing how everything played out the last time Blake used her kitty voice she swore to herself that she would never use it again. At least, not to get a date. That was of course before she was put on the team with the sexiest girls in beacon.

She looked over her book to watch Yang and Ruby pal around. Her imagination filling with all kinds of taboo fantasies of those twos playing with each other in more intimate ways. Ruby sucking on Yang's tits... Yang fisting her little sister...

Of course she couldn't forget Weiss. Schnee or not, the girl was sexy. Always studying...Probably studies how to please her partners...hmm...

Eventually Blake decided that she's had it, she has to use her voice to fuck someone! The question was who...?
1.title: Blake's Progress

info.description:
(During first three volumes)

Blake was always nervous about her special skill. She wasn't sure if it was a second semblance, but she did know she was ashamed of it.
Whenever Blake talks like an anime catgirl, people will do whatever she tells them. They won't even think it's weird. After how bad the last time she used that power turned out she swore she wouldn't use it again.
Or at least she wouldn't if her teammates weren't the sexiest trio of women ever! Between Yang's tits, Ruby's eyes and Weiss's everything how could Blake resist having some sexy fun?

My other RWBY hypnosis stories:
